scripts.docker_build: docker build -t docker.io/eidolonai/webui -t docker.io/eidolonai/webui:$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') .
scripts.docker_push: docker push docker.io/eidolonai/webui:$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') &&  docker push docker.io/eidolonai/webui:latest
scripts.maybe_docker_push: VERSION=$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') &&  docker manifest inspect docker.io/eidolonai/webui:$VERSION >/dev/null && echo 'Image exists' || npm run docker_push
scripts.publish-packages: turbo run build lint test && changeset version && changeset publish
